name: Carrot cake
summary: This cheeky, cream cheese-frosted carrot cake has a secret crush.
description: Fluffy moist carrot cake sponge, liberally studded crispy crunch walnuts, layered with velvet smooth citrus cream cheese.

name: Napoleon cake
summary: Flaky, buttery puff pastry layered between sweet vanilla custard
description: Napoleon Cake is a classic Eastern European cake, made of very thin and flaky puff pastry cake layers and a smooth, rich and luscious pastry cream in between the layers.

name: Chocolate cake
summary: Rich, fluffy, and beyond moist classic Chocolate Cake
description: Chocolate sponge cake, with a fresh cream filling. Topped with cocoa powder, and fresh fruit

name: Kyiv cake
summary: Two layers crisp, nutty meringue with melt in mouth cognac and cocoa butter cream.
description: Kyiv Cake is light and airy in the center, with a bit of a crunch, sandwiched by soft sponge layers. It's a true Ukrainian Classic cake.

name: Honey cake
summary: Ten thin layers of soft, airy cakes that taste like bee's heaven
description: Honey cake is made up of crispy and thin cake layers that are separated by a thick cream cheese frosting.

name: Red Velvet cake
summary: Vanilla flavor, velvety crumb and signature red colored chocolate cake layers
description: Red Velvet Cake is instantly recognizable with its bright red color offset by a white Cream Cheese Frosting

name: Mint Chocolate cake
summary: Perfect combo of my favorite Chocolate Cake, and green Mint Frosting.
description: Mint Chocolate Cake is three amazing layers of dark chocolate cake with a delicate mint buttercream in between each layer.

name: Rainbow cake
summary: Multi-coloured marvel of moist sponge layers and lightly whipped white frosting is no illusion.
description: Rainbow cake has the vanilla layers that are sandwiched together with cream cheese frosting.

name: Black Forest cake
summary: Chocolate sponge cake sandwiched with a rich cherry filling and whipped cream.
description: Black Forest Cake combines rich chocolate cake layers with fresh cherries, cherry liqueur, and a simple whipped cream frosting.

name: Classic Vanilla cake
summary: Fluffy vanilla cake layers with a silky vanilla buttercream is the best for any occasion.
description: Four layers of the most moist and tender cake and vanilla butter cream frosting, this is The Best Classic Vanilla Cake

name: Éclair
summary: Chocolate-frosted oblong pastry filled with whipped cream.
description: An éclair is a French dessert made from choux pastry, filled with pastry cream or custard and topped with fondant icing.

name: Coconut cake
summary: Supremely moist with a soft fluffy crumb and intense coconut flavor.
description: Fluffy, soft, with the perfect amount of coconut flavor, topped with creamy coconut buttercream frosting!

name: Macha cake
summary: Matcha cake layers & fluffy buttercream frosting that's perfectly sweet.
description: It's the perfect birthday cake for anyone obsessed with matcha! The sponge is infused with the green tea and sandwiched together with lashings of butter cream

name: Caramel cake
summary: A buttery soft vanilla layer cake blanketed with a georgeous caramel icing!
description: This moist, fluffy caramel cake has layers of vanilla yellow cake covered in homemade salted caramel and creamy caramel-infused Swiss meringue buttercream.
